Text:
i have divx plus but i could not find how to enter the provided serial number to get it register to have divx pro...please advise...

cheers,

@cwong668
Np..The easiest way to explain is click on start/All programs and scroll down to were you see the divx folder. Now once you are in the divx folder there is 2 easy ways to do register. Either select the Register located in the folder and enter the provided serial , or Divx Control panel and in the divx control panel on the left hand side you should see Product Registration simply click that and enter the provided serial. Please Advise if this helps.:)

both ways are ok ... it works...

it was registered but the application still remain calling divx plus & not changing to divx pro ... it is ok...

it registered the MPEG-2/DVD plug-in and DFX audio enhancer after submitting the serial number...

so these two so call pro added functions...

cheers,
Dfx in DivX Player is trial and has expired.

Thank you for the info:)

Here is the update http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7690657

Enjoy:)
